sentences.english: I was stunned by his remarks full of vile curses.
sentences.chinese: 他的滿口髒話令我齒冷。

sentences.english: And make time's spoils despised everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 使時光的剽竊到處遭人齒冷。

sentences.english: And written as "Prosperous prophecy" out of time as two similar ideas were despise.
sentences.chinese: 其作爲與寫《盛世危言》時如出兩轍，被人齒冷。
